response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above the market average. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I kindly propose a purchase price of $2,000,000 for this product. This offer not only reflects the true value of the product but also provides you with an opportunity to secure it at a competitive advantage. Should you decide to accept this offer, we can discuss further details and ensure a smooth transaction. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 2000000}
